website_summaries.verdict: A lot of wearers commented that the Asics Gel Nimbus 20 was a comfortable running shoe. They were satisfied with its visually-appealing design and attractive color variations. They loved wearing the shoe on different paved surfaces. Although several of them said that it has a narrow toe box, others still recommended the shoe because of its perfect fit. Some were also disappointed with its stiff footbed. In general, the majority of the purchasers said that the Asics Gel Nimbus 20 was an excellent choice for those who want a stylish, well-constructed and supportive yet lightweight running shoe.
pros: Many buyers commented that the shoe was comfortable
A lot of testers admired its great-looking design
Some purchasers mentioned that the shoe was true to size
According to those who have tried it, the Asics Gel Nimbus 20 has a wide range color variation
The majority of the consumers noted that the shoe provided excellent support on a variety of surfaces
The Asics Gel Nimbus 20 was lightweight, according to many buyers
The cushioning of the shoe was incredible, based on observations
A handful of purchasers agreed that the fit was perfect
Several runners loved its well-constructed upper
cons: Some of the users said that the toe box was narrow
Several testers agreed that the Asics Gel Nimbus 20 has minimal arch support
According to a lot of buyers, the shoe has a stiffer footbed when compared to the previous models
One of the runners felt a little pain in the Achilles and calves’ area

customer_reviews.title: These shoes have changed over the years for the worse. Not worth the $$$ anymore
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to replace an older version of the Gel-Nimbus. They've taken away what I loved most about these shoes . . lots of padding in the soles and a large toebox (I ordered a wide). I compared these to the Gel-Nimbus I am currently wearing and there really is no comparison. These look like my Nikes which cost me 1/3 as much. These are going back. Way overpriced for what they have become. I am continuing my quest to find an athletic shoe closer to what the Gel-Nimbus used to be.
customer_reviews.author: David Austin

customer_reviews.title: I have always liked asics shoes but this pair make my feet feel ...
customer_reviews.text: I have always liked asics shoes but this pair make my feet feel like I'm walking on marshmallows. Most shoes that I wear make my back hurt at the end of the day, but with the nimbus 20 series I don't have that problem. With a job that has me on my feet all day, at the end of the day, I feel like I can keep on going for another 8 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Amend

customer_reviews.title: I liked them until I noticed the tread wear after 19 days.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only had these shoes for 19 days and I’m disappointed in the amount of wear on the tread already. I’ve only gone 74.5 miles WALKING, but at this rate the shoes are going to be wore down to nothing before long. I’ve owned three different versions of Nimbus over the past few years for running- the 20s are the most disappointing version and I haven’t even taken them running yet. I wouldn’t buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: NZ.Nick

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using the ASICS Gel-Nimbus Shoes since they were on model 13. And these continue to show they know how to make a great shoe. It’s not like others, with this type of sole it provides a soft squishy bottom that conforms to your foot, but also provides nice support while doing what you need to do. I’ve noticed they tend to last the entire year through daily exercise and jogging. I will be buying another pair of these once these get about 150-200 miles on them.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Falls Apart Quickly
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to like these shoes but they just don’t hold up. The photo shows ASICS with a hole in the toe box after just 7 weeks (there is a similar hole in the left shoe as well). I included one of my New Balance shoes that over a year old for comparison. The ASICS helped with my under probation issue which is why I switched brands after numerous pairs of NB. However I can’t justify a higher price for a shoe that falls apart. There is also an unexplained spot worn through along the band next to the shoe tongue. I’ll go back to NB.
customer_reviews.author: Zensense

customer_reviews.title: Best sports shoes
customer_reviews.text: Asics sizing hasn't been true with each release. I had bought 15 pairs between release 14-21; started out at size 11, went to 11 1/2, and now 12. The 11s I have seems to be a bit roomier, especially the width. Next pair may go to a wide. Perhaps the later releases have more cushion causing a smuggler feel. Release 20 has the best laces that seems to have a little stretch to it; I like that. The shoe soles are also my favorite design. The Asics Gel-Nimbus are by far the best overall sports shoes I had ever worn, at any price.
customer_reviews.author: William E. Hanson

customer_reviews.title: order a half to a full size larger
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a men's 10.5 to 11 in athletic shoes. I ordered an 11 in this shoe given the comments in other reviews about toe room. However, even ordering an 11, the toe room is quite narrow and my toes feel a bit scrunched - particularly my big toe. Were I to order these again, I would definitely get an 11.5. Their sizing is just off and it sounds like they are all sized just a bit too small. Other than that, they are extremely comfortable shoes. Had the sizing been more accurate, I would definitely have given them 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: R. Rogge

customer_reviews.title: If you liked previous Gel Nimbus models, one more of the same
customer_reviews.text: I've bought a pair of Gel Nimbus every year for at least 5-6 years, this latest model preserves all the things I like: great support (I'm a big guy), comfort, and good traction on wet surfaces. The colors offered change every year and the charcoal I got this year while not flashy will probably stay nice longer than the white I got last year. I hope they have finally fixed the line's one regular flaw: the top of the heel cup has always fallen apart and ended up being quite uncomfortable. Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Roger A. Knopf

customer_reviews.title: Finally figured out that ASICS shoes have gotten smaller. ...
customer_reviews.text: Finally figured out that ASICS shoes have gotten smaller. now need and additional 1/2 size larger. Larger size fits well.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Back to what ASICS are all about
customer_reviews.text: I had a pair of 19s and hated them. I ended up buying another pair of 17s because I liked those. I was wary of trying the 20s but I can say that they are BACK!! Thank you ASICS for returning to your roots.
customer_reviews.author: E. Vicknair

customer_reviews.title: Bye bye New Balance, hello A$0
customer_reviews.text: Always bought new balance - decided to try this brand. Glad I did. These are the most comfortable sneakers I’ve ever worn. On a scale of 10 - these are a 10. New Balance 7 (993’s to the new foam ones). Build quality is great. I’m hard in sneakers and these have held up better than any sneaker before. ASICS is my new go to brand. Also love the color, gotten at least a dozen compliments on them. 10/10.
customer_reviews.author: eDamon

customer_reviews.title: Recommend purchasing directly from ASICS
customer_reviews.text: These were the second pair that I purchased (first pair was from Road Runner Sports). Purchased these because the first pair had great cushion and had a “roll” to them when I ran. The pair I purchased on Amazon feel flat, don’t have as much cushion, and have been giving me pain in my Achilles and sides of foot. I run on either the side walk or street (asphalt) and usually run approximately 4-7 miles and the pain normally starts around mile 1.5-2. Not sure if different quantity sold on amazon or I just received a bad pair. Im a HUGE Asics fan but was a bit disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Tony M.

customer_reviews.title: Width is too narrow
customer_reviews.text: I’ve owned several Gel Nimbus shoes starting with 18. The last ones I bought prior to this purchase were 10.5 normal width. I’ve had them for a few months now and they’ve always seemed a little tight in the toe box. I just bought the same exact shoe in a 10.5 Wide and it’s exactly the same width. In fact, the shoes themselves just aren’t as comfortable. I’m returning them and will just stay with my normal width shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Music Pro

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: My husband used to wear ASICS many years ago. He has been wearing Brooks for about the last 15 years. He wanted a gray pair of shoes. I couldn’t find any neutral cushion in gray other than these ASICS Nimbus, so I ordered them. I am glad I did, because he said they are very comfortable with plenty of room in the toe box.
customer_reviews.author: MardiGrasBallGoer

customer_reviews.title: Great for underpronation
customer_reviews.text: I have had back and knee problems for years. I'm overweight and underpronate. I did a bunch of research and landed on these shoes. They have done wonders for my back and knees. The only real complaint is that the soles are a bit hard for my taste, so my feet hurt after going a long distance in them, but that's a small price to pay for the support they offer.
customer_reviews.author: D. Chauran

customer_reviews.title: Not nearly as nice as my Gel Nimbus 19
customer_reviews.text: Figured I'd get a replacement for my 19's since I've worn them out. Super disappointed in these 20's. They were not comfortable at all. They were uneven from left to right. Like the left shoe felt different than the right. And they were super hard. There was virtually no cushion as compared to the 19's.
customer_reviews.author: Jason N. Mundis

customer_reviews.title: Come on Asics
customer_reviews.text: Stay away from the Nimbus 20. No where in comparison to my Nimbus 17. Too afraid to buy any nimbus shoes going forward. The Nimbus 20 is too narrow and causes pain in my left foot when running. I thought it was me until I took my Nimbus 17 out of retirement. The Nimbus 17 is still the most comfortable shoe I have ever ran in. The Nimbus 17 instantly eliminated my foot pain.
customer_reviews.author: Copastedy

customer_reviews.title: Significant Changes
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers appear to have significantly less cushioning than the 19s....I don't get it...Why screw around with something that is working just fine. I got the 11 4D and even then, the toe box appears smaller than the 19s. I have some rubbing on my left big toe. I really hope they break in soon and give some in that area. They should have stopped at the 17s. I can't send the back, so I'm stuck with them.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Over a year now, my first Nimbus! Very light and love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have been a die hard ASIC GEL-Kayano series fan for some time. But last year I saw a discounted price on Nimbus and went for it. It has been a year now and I am more than happy to say that I tried it & I love it! I saw Nimbus 21 on sale for $79.99 and placed the order just yesterday, crossing my figures! Hope it will be as good as Nimbus 20 or better!
customer_reviews.author: gk

customer_reviews.title: Not as much cushion as previous Nimbus
customer_reviews.text: These are the most uncomfortable pair of Nimbus I've ever brought! The sole is very hard more similar to the Gel-Noosa Tri line. They aren't as comfortable as the previous ones...I'm just realizing how uncomfortable these are as my feet ache and I tried my old Numbus.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Thomas

customer_reviews.title: My second pair of these and love them
customer_reviews.text: 10.5D and love them. My second pair, first pair went through a train up and a marathon, these survived a train up, half marathon and more training. Soles are lasting despite running on the road, treadmill and track. About to buy my 3rd pair. My wife also wears the same type and is on her 3rd pair.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: TOE BOX TOO SMALL
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing Nimbus for several years. So I decided to skip 19 and go for 20. TOE BOX IS TOO SMALL even though I ordered 1/2 size bigger... I am just wondering who is designing this show like that.All previous ones were fine and I had no issue..... Probably Asics either does not care or just has a production issues
customer_reviews.author: Buzz

customer_reviews.title: no bounce
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Asics for over a decade. This is one of the worst nimbus running shoes that Asics has produced. there is absolutely no bounce. It feels like a walking shoe. Every year Asics make a new series, but almost always leaves something out that screws it up. the best it had produced was No. 13, alas it was discontinued a long time ago.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: PAIN IN THE BACK AND HIP
customer_reviews.text: OMG! this shoe nearly broke my back. I don't know what changes they mastered into their technology developing this shoe but I wore it once to the gym and my back and hip were thrown out of alignment. I could not go to the gym for a week. This shoe throw your body out of alignment. I own 3 pairs of this model ASICS from the past 3 years with no problems.. This pair is awful! I have contacted ASICS customer support and they said they made no changes and only offered me a 25% discount to purchase yet another pair of PAIN! They changed this shoe to drastically from prior years. It does not work and I'm out $90.
customer_reviews.author: THE MARSHMALLOW KITCHEN

customer_reviews.title: Color change
customer_reviews.text: No issues with quality as I’ve used this shoe for some time. When I ordered another pair I found the color and size I wanted and ordered. When shoes arrived they were different color so I set up for return and reordered. I then realized what happened, when you order a size that isn’t available the site automatically changes it to a different shoe in the size you ordered. I didn’t catch it the first time so be aware. I think it’s a big flaw in the site.
customer_reviews.author: Michael N.

customer_reviews.title: Not as Roomy in the Toe Box as the G-N 17s
customer_reviews.text: This shoe was better than the Gel-Nimbus 18 and 19 but I put a Gel-Nimbus 17 on one foot and the 20 on another and it was not close. The 20 just does not have the room in the toe box that the 17 has. Am sending them back and buying the Brooks Ghost. Not the shoe the 17 is but it is better than the 20. Looking forward to the Gel-Nimbus 21.
customer_reviews.author: J. Prothro

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan since the nimbus 18
customer_reviews.text: These feel 2-3x more firm than the 18's I've purchased. I'm not a fan of the changes. I'm going to start looking for better shoes. I'm on my feet for 12+ hours a day and won't use these for work, these are yard work shoes; unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Mister K

customer_reviews.title: Improvement over the Nimbus 19
customer_reviews.text: Fits great. Had to skip the Nimbus 19 due to the shrunken toe box. First time I didn't buy Nimbus since the 14 came out. These have just enough room for me now.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Newer but not better
customer_reviews.text: The fit is good, size 11 since N16. It does feel narrower, both on the sides and the toe part, not a big problem for me as my feet are not wide. My knees are no longer young so I fell in love with N16 the minute I put them on. N17 is even more comfortable and I wore them all day long. N20 feels not as soft and comfortable at all as my previous N17. I have been wearing Nimbus shoes mostly for walking, and occasionally for jogging on road. With this pair, walking is as good, but after jogging my knees feel a bit painful. Hope one day ASICS will relaunch the N17s.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Loo

customer_reviews.title: fun color.
customer_reviews.text: comfortable. still not as much support as I'd like but I don't think Asics makes a show with more instep support. I bot another pair to use as my in-the-house only shoe they're so comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: S. Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: My first ASICS shoes I’ve bought and so far after about a week I have to say are very comfortable! I haven’t done any long runs yet, but have been doing lots of walking and some quick runs and so far they seem great. My old shoes were starting to cause my heels to hurt, but these seem to have resolved that problem, so very happy so far.
customer_reviews.author: C.G

customer_reviews.title: Great Support
customer_reviews.text: My husband had knee surgery to help ease the pain in his right knee. His recovery period is over, but his knee was still swelling after lots of walking. This weekend, he spent a day sightseeing in Washington DC walking for miles in these shoes with no pain or swelling in his knee!
customer_reviews.author: Bram4000

customer_reviews.title: Overall good
customer_reviews.text: Slightly smaller than a previous version of the same shoe I have, but still a great feeling shoe. Would recommend some thicker socks if you are running in the winter like me as they breath a lot which is a bonus in the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Ebelt

customer_reviews.title: Oops!
customer_reviews.text: I always buy Asics and currently have 6 pair. This shoe was a disappointment because it rubbed the inside (medial side) of my big toe to the point of causing a blister. I had to return them for a refund. But I still think Asics brand is best. Just happened to get a bad shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Poss

customer_reviews.title: These were recommended by my podiatrist as a "neutral-cushioning" answer for my ...
customer_reviews.text: First off...I'm not a runner...at least not yet. These were recommended by my podiatrist as a "neutral-cushioning" answer for my plantar fasciitis. The fit was about right since I've learned to buy these a size larger than I need. Plenty of room by the toes without being sloppy. What surprised me though was that these weren't as cushioned as my last pair (which were 16's), but since I went a size large there is plenty of room for an insert. They feel good and I'll buy another pair when these are used up...just hope the "21's" are a little softer in the heel.
customer_reviews.author: William Gaw

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I always get gel-nimbus and these do not disappoint. I think this is about two generations newer than my last pair and OMG... these are really nice. Very comfortable and sizing was as expected. I hope they hold up like my last 4 or 5 pairs. I'm sure we will have a long, happy relationship!
customer_reviews.author: R. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, these are the best running shoes hands down
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I cannot think about running with a different pair of shoes than the Nimbus, and I run 25 miles per week at 7'30" per mile. Let the soy-latte people do their yoga fitness in Nike shoes, but if you really, REALLY run, Nimbus should be your only choice.
customer_reviews.author: carlo

customer_reviews.title: ... little bit bigger than I normally need and I'm glad I did
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and ordered a little bit bigger than I normally need and I'm glad I did. They fit great and feel FANTASTIC. I have plantar fasciitis and these shoes make the pain better. Plus the design is great. (I'm a woman, by the way. I wear men's tennis shoes because I appreciate the extra width.)
customer_reviews.author: Trista

customer_reviews.title: Get half size bigger!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best running shoe for me - top of the line Asics. I returned size 10 because they were biting my toes and ordered 10.5 which fit me perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Glyutlin

customer_reviews.title: Try the Brooks Ghost 11 instead of ASICS!
customer_reviews.text: I used to love the prior versions of the Gel Nimbus but these are less comfortable, more cheaply made. If you need a wide width comfortable running shoe the Brooks Ghost 11 are amazing! They are my new go to shoe. Goodbye ASICS Gel Nimbus, hello Brooks Ghost 11.
customer_reviews.author: MJA

customer_reviews.title: and version 20 of this great line of shoes does not disappoint
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 10 4E, and have supination in my stride. ASICS' Gel-Nimbus series has been my go-to shoe for running, and version 20 of this great line of shoes does not disappoint. If you suffer from supination, this is a great shoe. If you have wide feet, the 4E size is your shoe.
customer_reviews.author: themaltese

customer_reviews.title: Go up a half size and get a size wider than what you wear.*this is because the toe is narrow*
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe overall toe box is narrow i got a wider shoe and that gave more room than the pair i had to return i also went up a 1/2 size. This shoe is specially for people that walk on the outsides of their feet.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: x wide  fantastic
customer_reviews.text: i got this for my hubby, this x wide asics fits him perfectly, and he is so happy by it Since wide sizes are not always available in market, he suffers alot with finding a comfy shoes
customer_reviews.author: Ownyi Ratss

customer_reviews.title: Beware of seller: SFO Running
customer_reviews.text: 1st pair purchased fit true to my regular Asics sizing (1/2 size up). Reasonable shoe: 4/5 stars. 2nd pair purchased from SFO Running via Amazon. Beware. Shoes arrived in beat up box, no tags attached & toe boxes stuffed haphazardly. Clearly a returned pair that was resold as new. Why? The shoe size on the label was 2 sizes different from the shoe itself. How do I know? I compared it to the 1st pair I already owned. Beware of SFO Running. Returned the 2nd Pair.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. C.

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart after just 14 months
customer_reviews.text: Love ASICS. They consistently run on small though. I usually end up in about 1/2 size up. Update after 14 months - uppers have several spots where the material has disintegrated into holes. Very disappointed. I will be looking elsewhere for my next pair of shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Kramer

customer_reviews.title: I could not use without constantly snagging my toenail with every step.
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers look excellent and are extremely comfortable and fit great ! But my perfectly trimmed big toenail gets caught on the sneaker with every single step ! The first pair of sneakers that ever did that and I love ASICS ! They are going back.
customer_reviews.author: Vince Perri

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: The ASICS Gel Nimbus are my go to shoes, and have been for years. They fit well and are very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Richard L

customer_reviews.title: Do not order!!!!
customer_reviews.text: They are too short ordering my size shoe and Shoecity did not specify return shipping charge. Will not be ordering from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Richard

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes, nice fit.  Good service.  Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Firstly, the yellow/black shoes are yellow as much as they are yellowish green. Even better. I got my shoes in a couple of days. The fit is about like the other various ASICS shoes I have worn. I normally wear a 10 and these 10s fit just right. These are very nice shoes. They are going to do me well. Shoebacca even included a free pair of nice socks. Great doin' business with you guys.
customer_reviews.author: Greench

customer_reviews.title: They last well on my runs and are an Excellent Fit! While not excessively cushy
customer_reviews.text: I'm about a third of the way into their life probably, but I'm considering ordering another pair ahead as my next pair too. They last well on my runs and are an Excellent Fit! While not excessively cushy, you can feel the protection, which I've found is not a given any more.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Hipius

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me!
customer_reviews.text: If I am not in the right shoes my feet hurt. I haave been purchasing Nimbus' for years. Recently bought a Wide Nike running shoe. Big mistake for me. I went back to the Nimbus and they made immediate difference. I have seen many reviews regarding narrowing of toe box from earlier versions, while this may be true, I always buy 4E and have no issue with toe box. I will not make mistake of getting anything other than Nimbus again!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff H.

customer_reviews.title: One of the most comfortable shoe you can get
customer_reviews.text: It was recommended to me by a surgeon to get these shoes. He's on his feet for hours on end some days and had tried many styles, and he said the Asics Gel Nimbus were the most comfortable shoe he's had. I'm glad I listened to him, because I haven't steered away from them for over three years now. I've purchased new pairs right before Disney trips where we've walked about 7 miles a day for a week, and they've never even needed to be broken in. I would definitely recommend these shoes to anyone looking for comfort
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Jolgren

customer_reviews.title: perfect for supinators
customer_reviews.text: user and asics lover for 5 years. this has been my day shoe for years totally love everything about it. wish they also had dress and canvas versions
customer_reviews.author: Setu Gupta

customer_reviews.title: Still a top choice
customer_reviews.text: ASICS shoes are still a top choice but I feel the overall quality and feel have slipped a notch. Quite frankly, they are not as comfortable as earlier versions - still good but not as good. I have a slightly narrow foot so these fit me well. If you have a wider foot you may need to look elsewhere. My guess is they run about a half size small.
customer_reviews.author: Satchel7426

customer_reviews.title: incorrect size
customer_reviews.text: My first pair of Asics Gel Nimbus were the model 15. I have ordered a new pair each year since. This is the first time the shoes did not fit. They hurt my toes because they were too small so I returned them and ordered model 21 direct from Asics and they fit like they always have in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Malachi Mecham

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these shoes just before the Chicago Marathon. They were perfect. I have wide feet and was able to comfortably run with them. I do wish that there were as many color choices as the regular fit version but that's not an important issue.
customer_reviews.author: Fsuleiman123

customer_reviews.title: Hard as a rock
customer_reviews.text: I had gel nimbus 17,18, 19 and they're all very comfortable a lot of cushion. The gel nimbus 20 is as hard as a rock no cushion what so ever. VERY, VERY disappointed. Don't recommend this gel nimbus 20 at all to someone looking for comfort. This has none :(
customer_reviews.author: Precious758

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe, Strange Design In Toes
customer_reviews.text: Felt great, but the new design has support inside the tip of the toe, which makes it feel like you're touching the tip with your big toe even though you still have room. Asics told me to get a half size up, but the price was much higher for the next size so I went with a different shoe.
customer_reviews.author: MT

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: I have plantar fasciitis , and I have been trying to find a comfortable, yet stable shoe thatI can use to walk in. I believe I have found them, they support my foot, are light weight and sturdy !!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Conklin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoes!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of this model of Ascics I have bought. One of the most comfortable athlete shoes I have owned!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen R

customer_reviews.title: They provide excellent heel support for those suceptible to plantar faccitis
customer_reviews.text: I’m currently training for my second marathon and these shoes are the only ones that do not cause much of any pain while training. They provide excellent heel support for those suceptible to plantar faccitis, I used to get it a lot with brooks but these I find help a lot. Definitely worth the money, I put close to 500 miles on my last pair.
customer_reviews.author: Robbie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit, Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is my 5 pair of ASICS (3 different styles), and they have all been true to size. Only had this pair for a few days, but I am very impressed with the shoe construction and overall comfort.
customer_reviews.author: MacA

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is great. I always go with Asics Nimbus or Cumulus and this version doesn't disappoint. It's comfortable and relatively light weight. I run multiple half marathons each year and I'm happy with these shoes. the 4E width is great too.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel K.

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of the Nimbius 20s. Love this shoe. Was able to order in wide size this time which is a better fit for me. Great price too. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Robert B

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe but laces ridiculous.
customer_reviews.text: I like these shoes a lot, they continue the excellence that is the Gel-Nimbus. However, they have STUPIDLY long shoelaces (despite tucking them in to the sides of my shoes I still tripped when one of them came untucked--extremely annoying). Save the laces from your current pair and put them in to these shoes when you buy them.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Product came when promised. I love these shoes. Second pair of this model I have ordered. My feet feel great. I refereed 9 games of soccer in these shoes last weekend. WOW!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Changed a lot
customer_reviews.text: I've worn Asics Nimbus gel for 15-20 years, always size 9 1/2. These are too tight in the toes and I have a very narrow foot. Sad they changed.
customer_reviews.author: flyflotr

customer_reviews.title: Shoe comfort
customer_reviews.text: This is what I always buy because it always fits great & very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: R. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Shoe came appart on day 2
customer_reviews.text: Bad: 1st time trying Asics Mid and outer soles came appart in day 2. Amazon has a complicated return system where I have to buy a 2nd pair to get a working one a week later. No thanks. Good: The inside cushion is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Max Gallardo

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and reliability.
customer_reviews.text: These are my third pair in the last 3 months and they are awesome. On my Fitbit, I average 21,000 steps a a day. I weigh 260 lbs and they do an awesome job of supporting my weight.
customer_reviews.author: Big Ol' Butts

customer_reviews.title: Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Shoe runs a little big for a size 10. They are comfortable, my big toe tends to hurt at times. I like them for now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits as expected
customer_reviews.text: Although this is a little on the snug side this fits as expected. ASIC is usually spot on with the size they advertise.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Fit was smaller then expected
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, well built and comfortable, but the fit was slightly smaller then usual, had to return and order half a size up.
customer_reviews.author: Krise

customer_reviews.title: Made mistake and ordered these kept them to work in.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shoe material over toe has started to tear but overall these shoes are very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Willy

customer_reviews.title: Great Running Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I have owned many pairs of ASCIS Gel Nimbus and I still love them for running.
customer_reviews.author: Ed In Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Loved them so much I bought another
customer_reviews.text: Second pair of these, have had them for well over a year now so I got a new pair but honestly didn’t even need to, they’re still as supportive as the new ones. I’ve been so used to replacing nikes every 6 months and I’m surprised these are lasting the way they do.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: I always size up a half size larger than my street shoe
customer_reviews.text: The Nimbus is a super cushioned shoe great for training on the roads .
customer_reviews.author: Joee

customer_reviews.title: ASICS
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable...nicer looking in person got them earlier than expected. Great price too.
customer_reviews.author: Georgie

customer_reviews.title: The best nimbus
customer_reviews.text: use nimbus since version 7 this version 20 is the best I have used together with the nimbus 15 the size has changed until version 17 I was 8.5 now size 9 and going bie
customer_reviews.author: SANTY

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used my pair of shoes for over a year now and still this is the best pair of shoes I’ve had, good for all day wear and awesome for running. I do trade show and stand in place for hours on end love this show
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I already use asics shoes for a time. This is probably the 5th pair I bought, the second one of this same model. I loved this one, comfortable and right size. One of the best thing was the color, loved to finally find one completely black.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Cartola

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes...in the right size!
customer_reviews.text: A great shoe we've purchased many times. I had to return this one with no problems, because I ORDERED THE WRONG SIZE! My fault! Got the correct size and they're great!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Frantz

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: New favorite shoes for running (5ks to half marathons). Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Andy B

customer_reviews.title: Go up a half size for wide feet
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic shoes, which I've owned before, and definitely helped me pick the best size. They arrived undamaged and fit fantastic out of the box!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: This shoe fits as expected
customer_reviews.text: I needed a wide width in the women's but it wasn't available, so I went with a men's smaller size and the men's regular width is a wide for me and they are perfect. A nice exercise shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Irishmomof2

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SHOES
customer_reviews.text: I just received my Asics Nimbues Gel 20, and they look / fit great. Even I didn't tried them yet, they look excelent andthe fitting is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: MARCELO BRUCKMAN

customer_reviews.title: Cumulus quality
customer_reviews.text: It's not a terrible shoe, but the Nimbus 20 more resembles a Cumulus circa 2014 rather than the Nimbus 17, which I consider the zenith of cushioning. The material in the heel is lacking, the sole is stiffer, and the insole is thinner/harder. I need to find a better shoe for my 15-20 mile weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: My kids loves these shoes - 2nd Pair
customer_reviews.text: My kid with horribly flat (hobbit) feet loves these shoes
customer_reviews.author: Rodger Price

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and quick delivery!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a runner and wears these sneakers all the time, so we knew they would be great. However, the price was great and we received them very quickly. 5 stars all the way!
customer_reviews.author: TLC

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Style, sturdy, comfort all within the sphere of what I expect from ASICS
customer_reviews.author: LP  Dobler

customer_reviews.title: A supportive and comfortable shoe.
customer_reviews.text: This product is excellent. My husband has ordered these shoes several times and rates them as excellent. He uses them for walking around. They are comfortable and supportive.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Ashton Harbin

customer_reviews.title: USED
customer_reviews.text: The tags and packaging were missing so that's a good sign they'd been worn before. The bottom of the shoes were dirty as well. These are mislabeled as trail shoes which I knew before I bought them. I was in a bind and needed them quickly so I purchased. I'm okay with them being a returned item, but some may not be. True to fit. Good shoes though.
customer_reviews.author: M Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Great neutral running shoes. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd pair of Asics Nimbus 20. The shoe is high quality and feels great. This is not a trail shoes as listed in the discription but a road running shoes. Wonderful neutral running shoes.
customer_reviews.author: hh

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I use this shoe daily for exercise. Very comfortable. Sizing is a little on the small side. I generally wear a 10 or 10 1/2, and bought 11 in this shoe, which fits fine.
customer_reviews.author: NM MD

customer_reviews.title: Narrower than you'd expect
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely made running shoe, good value too, but the 2E size was narrow - more like a D width.
customer_reviews.author: CrusaderRabbit50

customer_reviews.title: Narrow fit
customer_reviews.text: My husband usually wears a 9.5N or 10N, yet he needed a regular width 10.5 in this Asics. They are supportive and cushiony. He claims they feel like he's running on pillows.
customer_reviews.author: High Expectations

customer_reviews.title: Avoid nimbus 20
customer_reviews.text: Worst quality ASICS I have ever worn. Glue came u stuck. I have bought more blaster this pair but different number. Avoid Nimbis 20
customer_reviews.author: Frugal Mike

customer_reviews.title: True to size
customer_reviews.text: As a long time Asics customer i was unsure to to sizing issues reported. I bought the same size and width as my Ascis Persue and the fit perfectly. For me there was no need to order wider or to up size. These fit true to size with other Asics models.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Another excellent product from ASICS. Light weight, sturdy, quick drying shoes. Spot on fit too for internet purchase.
customer_reviews.author: No One

customer_reviews.title: Feel great
customer_reviews.text: Been wearing ASICs for a few decades as 'everyday shoes'. These Nimbus 20s are very comfortable. I did have to exchange a pair and go a half size bigger than my 1 year old Nimbus 19s.
customer_reviews.author: mam

product_meta.title: ASICS Men's Fitness/Cross-Training Trail Running Shoe
product_meta.description: A smooth, comfortable ride that's 20 years in the making. Packed with our revolutionary lightweight flytefoam® cushioning and other advanced technology from the ASICS® institute of sports science, the Nimbus caters to neutral runners of all levels. Its gradient jacquard-mesh fluid fit® upper strategically adapts to your foot's natural motion while 3-d printed overlays offer extra support to give you a customized fit that keeps you going mile after mile. Weight: 8.8. Heel height: 25mm. Forefoot height: 12mm.
feature_bullets: FLYTEFOAM MIDSOLE TECHNOLOGY Our FlyteFoam technology provides exceptional bounce back and responsiveness no matter the distance, utilizing organic super fibers to help reduce packing out that traditionally happens with softer, low density foams.
FLUIDRIDE MIDSOLE: ASICS FluidRide midsole provides the ultimate combination of bounce back and cushioning properties with reduced weight and exceptional durability.
